abstract: The reinsurance company Transatlantic Holdings rejected a $55.35 a share offer from Validus Holdings on Thursday, continuing a months-long takeover battle.
snippet: The reinsurance company Transatlantic Holdings rejected a $55.35 a share offer from Validus Holdings on Thursday, continuing a months-long takeover battle.
lead_paragraph: The battle for the reinsurance company Transatlantic Holdings continued on Thursday, as Validus Holdings failed to win approval for its latest bid even after increasing the offer.
